subject: asset(icons): redesign avatar with bushy beard and combed hair in emoji style
body:
Reworked the avatar SVG to be more emoji-like with warm skin tones,
a large bushy beard with texture lines, combed sides/back hair with
volume, bigger sparkly eyes, thick eyebrows, and a bushy mustache.
Regenerated all PNG sizes and favicon.
